name: L'affaire est dans le sac
description:
Game only available in French

Dive into a case full of secrets... In this point'n'click game, you will have to find clues in the scenery, question the suspects, and get to the truth by avoiding false leads.



Make connections between clues and solve problems to set the wheels of the case in motion.



Play as different actors of a criminal procedure and discover the stages of a case from different angles.



Where is the key to this true story, stored in the Gard departmental archives? It's up to you to find out... But beware, some people are not ready to empty their bag so easily.
